sentences.en: Soiled by her imposture she remains silent.
sentences.cn: 她背着冒名顶替者的黑锅却一直沉默。

sentences.en: This article observes that imposture in Copyright Law is the infringement of the right of signature of authors.
sentences.cn: 对争议中的冒名行为，笔者认为乃是属于侵害作者署名权的行为。

sentences.en: This new resource discovery algorithm can effectively restrain the imposture and pseudo service of P2P network, improve the reliability and security and decrease network load.
sentences.cn: 仿真试验表明，该算法有效的抑制了P2P网络中恶意节点的欺诈行为，降低了系统的消息负载，保证了请求节点获得服务和资源的可靠性和安全性。

sentences.en: What are an imposition, all a confounded imposture? - and I can prove it.
sentences.cn: 什么 是宗教税,什么是宗教礼节, 都是骗人的,乱七八糟的事,我并且可以证实.

words.tran_cn: 征收；强加；欺骗；不公平的负担
欺骗（impose的过去分词）；把…强加于

trans.tran_en: the act or an instance of deceiving others, esp by assuming a false identity
